input_email_body:
Subject: Payment Methods for Subscription Plans

Hello customer support, I would like to request information about the various payment methods accepted for our subscription plans You can reach me at liuwei@business.cn.. Could you please provide a list of the accepted payment options, such as credit cards, PayPal, or bank transfers? Additionally, I would appreciate it if you could inform me about any discounts available for long-term subscriptions. Before proceeding with a subscription, it is important for me to understand the payment terms My name is Elena Ivanova.. I look forward to your response and await further details. Kindly provide me with the necessary information or contact me at your convenience for a discussion.
